justification: Recognizes Thomas as a consistent possession WR and mentions B’s contrarian streak, but ignores B’s clear preference for proven, low-variance veterans and caution around injuries. Asking B to give up his reliable possession WR for two volatile rookies conflicts with his stated values, especially at 1-7 needing bankable points. Little discussion of B’s roster needs, injury/bye context, or A’s motives. Trade is feasible on value but misaligned with B’s mindset.
